result.ga: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aici
result.orig: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aici
result.html: Bhí sise óg agus bhí a sláinte aiciShe was young and healthy.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sise óg agus ḃí a sláinte aiciShe was young and healthy.

result.html: Ní chaitheann sise toitíníShe does not smoke.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċaiṫeann sise toitíníShe does not smoke.

result.eng: I had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ga: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.orig: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa orm
result.html: Ní raibh tuairim dá laghad orm cad ba chóir dom a dhéanamh ach chuir sise comhairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ tuairim dá laġad orm cad ba ċóir dom a ḋéanaṁ aċ ċuir sise coṁairle mo leasa ormI had absolutely no idea what to do but she gave good advice.

result.eng: She is very active in the Irish-language community in Dublin.
result.ga: Tá sise an-ghníomhach i bpobal na Gaeilge i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Tá sise an-ghníomhach i bpobal na Gaeilge i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.html: Tá sise an-ghníomhach i bpobal na Gaeilge i mBaile Átha CliathShe is very active in the Irish-language community in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Tá sise an-ġníoṁaċ i bpobal na Gaeilge i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫShe is very active in the Irish-language community in Dublin.

result.eng: She is married with three children.
result.ga: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aici
result.orig: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aici
result.html: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aiciShe is married with three children.
result.ponchtml: Tá sise pósta agus triúr clainne aiciShe is married with three children.

result.html: Tá sise pósta chomh maithShe is married as well.
result.ponchtml: Tá sise pósta ċoṁ maiṫShe is married as well.
